titles.title: Maritime Washington National Heritage Area Act
Maritime Washington National Heritage Area Act
A bill to establish the Maritime Washington Heritage Area in the State of Washington, and for other purposes.
Maritime Washington National Heritage Area Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Maritime Washington National Heritage Area Act
This bill establishes the Maritime Washington National Heritage Area in the state of Washington.
The Washington Trust for Historic Preservation shall be the local coordinating entity for the area and shall prepare and submit a management plan for it.
